sentences.en: a yacht moored at a pier
He backed his boat away from the pier.
I thought so, there he is, waiting on the pier.
sentences.cn: 不出我所料, 他果然在那里, 在码头上等着.

sentences.en: Perhaps you have seen a pier - glass in an $ 8 flat.
sentences.cn: 也许你见过每周房租八美元的公寓壁镜吧.

sentences.en: She stood up and surveyed herself in the pier - glass.
sentences.cn: 她站起身,对着 穿衣镜 上上下下照了一遍.

sentences.en: The motorboat put on speed as soon as it left the pier.
sentences.cn: 汽船一离开码头就加快了速度.

sentences.en: The pier has cafes and restaurants.
sentences.cn: 码头上有咖啡馆和饭馆.

sentences.en: The salvage was piled upon the pier.
sentences.cn: 抢救出的财产被堆放在码头上.

sentences.en: The ship lies at the pier.
The ship misperformed the maneuver and almost collided with the pier.
sentences.cn: 该船操纵不当,差点撞上码头.

sentences.en: The ship was making towards the pier.
The ship was moored broadside to the pier.
The warship was making towards the pier.
There was a pier - glass between the windows of the room.
sentences.cn: 房间的两扇窗子之间有一面壁镜.

sentences.en: Waves were swashing against the piers.
We could anchor off the pier.
sentences.cn: 我们可以在码头附近下锚停泊。

sentences.en: We stood on the pier and watched as they embarked.
sentences.cn: 我们站在突码头上目送他们登船。

trans.tran_cn: 码头，防波堤，桥墩，窗间壁
trans.tran_en: a structure that is built over and into the water so that boats can stop next to it or people can walk along it
